languages.text: "Потому что ты од{mf|ин|на} из них, мон..." {n}Ирлиэт удивленно моргает.{/n} "Да... память постепенно возвращается. Для подобных тебе мы используем слово "элантах".
"Because you are one of them, mon—" {n}Yrliet blinks, confused.{/n} "Yes... my memory is slowly returning. For ones like you, we use the word 'elantach.'"

languages.text: “因为你也是一只猴——”{n}伊莉耶特眨了眨眼，露出困惑的神色。{/n}“等等……我的记忆正在慢慢恢复。对于像你这样的人，我们一般称呼为‘外界人’。”
languages.original_text: "Because you are one of them, mon—" {n}Yrliet blinks, confused.{/n} "Yes... my memory is slowly returning. For ones like you, we use the word 'elantach.'"

traits.locale_text: “因为你也是一只猴——”{n}伊莉耶特眨了眨眼，露出困惑的神色。{/n}“等等……我的记忆正在慢慢恢复。对于像你这样的人，我们一般称呼为‘外界人’。”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «Porque eres {mf|uno|una} de ellos, mon...». {n}Yrliet pestañea confundida.{/n} «Sí... ya empiezo a recobrar la memoria. Usamos la palabra "elantach" para los que son como tú».
languages.original_text: "Because you are one of them, mon—" {n}Yrliet blinks, confused.{/n} "Yes... my memory is slowly returning. For ones like you, we use the word 'elantach.'"

traits.locale_text: «Porque eres {mf|uno|una} de ellos, mon...». {n}Yrliet pestañea confundida.{/n} «Sí... ya empiezo a recobrar la memoria. Usamos la palabra "elantach" para los que son como tú».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Parce que c'est ce que vous êtes, mon-k... » {n}Yrliet cligne des yeux, confuse.{/n} « Oh... Mes souvenirs me reviennent. Pour les individus comme vous, on utilise le mot "elantach". »
languages.original_text: "Because you are one of them, mon—" {n}Yrliet blinks, confused.{/n} "Yes... my memory is slowly returning. For ones like you, we use the word 'elantach.'"

traits.locale_text: « Parce que c'est ce que vous êtes, mon-k... » {n}Yrliet cligne des yeux, confuse.{/n} « Oh... Mes souvenirs me reviennent. Pour les individus comme vous, on utilise le mot "elantach". »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Weil Ihr zu ihnen gehört, Chem..." {n}Yrliet blinzelt verwirrt.{/n} "Ja ... meine Erinnerung kehrt langsam zurück. Für jemanden wie Euch benutzen wir das Wort 'Elantach'."
languages.original_text: "Because you are one of them, mon—" {n}Yrliet blinks, confused.{/n} "Yes... my memory is slowly returning. For ones like you, we use the word 'elantach.'"

traits.locale_text: "Weil Ihr zu ihnen gehört, Chem..." {n}Yrliet blinzelt verwirrt.{/n} "Ja ... meine Erinnerung kehrt langsam zurück. Für jemanden wie Euch benutzen wir das Wort 'Elantach'."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「お前もその一人なのだから…」{n}ユリエットは混乱しながらまばたきをした。{/n}「ああ…記憶が少しずつ戻ってきた。お前のような者には『エランタ』という言葉を使うんだ」
languages.original_text: "Because you are one of them, mon—" {n}Yrliet blinks, confused.{/n} "Yes... my memory is slowly returning. For ones like you, we use the word 'elantach.'"

traits.locale_text: 「お前もその一人なのだから…」{n}ユリエットは混乱しながらまばたきをした。{/n}「ああ…記憶が少しずつ戻ってきた。お前のような者には『エランタ』という言葉を使うんだ」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Çünkü sen de onlardan birisin mon..." {n}Yrliet, aklı karışmış bir biçimde gözlerini kırpıyor.{/n} "Evet... Hatıralarım yavaş yavaş yerine oturuyor. Senin gibilere 'elantach' deriz."
languages.original_text: "Because you are one of them, mon—" {n}Yrliet blinks, confused.{/n} "Yes... my memory is slowly returning. For ones like you, we use the word 'elantach.'"

traits.locale_text: "Çünkü sen de onlardan birisin mon..." {n}Yrliet, aklı karışmış bir biçimde gözlerini kırpıyor.{/n} "Evet... Hatıralarım yavaş yavaş yerine oturuyor. Senin gibiler için 'elantach' deriz."
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
